question: Question_04_(c)
statement:
Let $f(x)=\sqrt{x}-1$ and $g(x)=(f\circ f)(x)$. Find the derivative of
$g(x)$.
hints:
Recall that

$\displaystyle (f \circ f)(x) = \sqrt{\sqrt{x}-1} -1$.

This is a composition of functions, namely $\displaystyle \sqrt{x}$ and
$\displaystyle \sqrt{x}-1$ (and then the -1 term is easily
differentiated). This can be differentiated using the chain rule.
